head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Millennium Terror Plot

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Manufacturing, Operations and Logistics

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Millennium Terror Plot

abstract.p: Manhattan grand jury indicts Abu Doha, who is in custody in London, charging that he aided what prosecutors call plot to blow up Los Angeles International Airport just before start of 2000 (S)

block.p: A Manhattan grand jury has indicted a man who is in custody in London, charging that he aided what prosecutors call a plot to blow up Los Angeles International Airport just before the start of 2000. The eight-count indictment, filed on Monday in United States District Court, charges Abu Doha, also known as Dr. Haider, with providing money, safe houses and other aid to terrorists. Proceedings to extradite Mr. Doha, 37, are pending.
